title: Angel skin for Teemo
body: I think Teemo deserves this hes been put through so much shit and really a lot of other champions deserve more shit than Teemo does (ANNIE is a bitch). I don't know i just think it would be cool.

replies.body: I feel like Riot would do this as an April Fools skin, just to get the community in an uproar. And it would be totally worth it.

You've got it the wrong way round, Teemo puts us through shit. not the other way around.

but yes it would be a cool skin.
I think its a great idea it'll be so funny to see how people react as well
Angel Teemo, but when he activates Move Quick he becomes a demon during the speed boost?
